properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 13 at 2:37AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...15 feet early this morning, subsiding to 8 ft
early this afternoon.

- FIRST EBB...Around 630 AM Monday. Seas to 16 ft with breakers
likely.

- SECOND EBB...Very strong ebb around 630 PM Monday. Seas to 14
ft with breakers.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...Until noon PST today, and from 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST
Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY
